revision.text: ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|y-peg|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-geeh|conclusive imperfective}} {{nv-link-to-root|-GOʼ|AnO falls|an animate object falls}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she is [[fall#Verb|falling]] ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|momentaneous|∅/yi|da}}. {{nv-verbtable|IMPERFECTIVE |yishgeeh|yiigeeh|deiigeeh|nigeeh|wohgeeh|daahgeeh|yigeeh|daageeh|jigeeh|dajigeeh}} {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |yígoʼ|yiigoʼ|dasiigoʼ|yínígoʼ|woogoʼ|dasoogoʼ|yígoʼ|daazgoʼ|jíígoʼ|dajizgoʼ}} {{nv-verbtable|FUTURE |deeshgoh|diigoh|dadiigoh|díígoh|doohgoh|dadoohgoh|doogoh|dadoogoh|jidoogoh|dazhdoogoh}} ====Verbal stems==== * IMPERFECTIVE: -geeh * PERFECTIVE: -goʼ * FUTURE: -goh * ITERATIVE: -goh * OPTATIVE: -geeh ====Related terms==== * {{l|nv|digeeh}}
